about_the_game:
The realm is in crisis. The royal family, which welcomed you into its court and raised you as a noble knight, is in danger. The king himself, the one to whom you are totally devoted, is forced to make a terrible decision.... The only one that can still save the fate of all the people of the kingdom to which you belong.... You will have to escort his daughter, and your best friend, Princess Goldbraid, to an exotic kingdom no one knows about, to become the wife of a prince no one knows. Although everyone agrees on the inevitability of this solution, it scares you and involves you emotionally... Especially when, having arrived in the new kingdom, you discover to your enormous amazement that all the inhabitants have a very strange peculiarity, which is... No more spoilers! Play "Save the kingdom," impersonating the noble knight, and with your choices you can influence the development of the story, witness spicy scenes, and unlock different endings. Will your friendship with Goldbraid blossom into true love? Or into fiery passion? Will you be able to discover all the secrets of the exotic kingdom's court? Will you get caught up in court intrigue, or will you be able to discover the true intentions of each character? Will you be able to resist the lust that lurks in the court, or will you get caught up in it? Most importantly. Will you save the kingdom?

Features:

- 2000 images, 1920x1080 full HD resolution.
- Ren'Py Engine.
- 30 thousand words.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains :
- Nudity.
- Fetish scene.
- Explicit sex.
- Sexual assault.
- Strong language.

name: Save the Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
